alert.note: Alert for Chase; Lyon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 06 at 8:11AM CDT until June 07 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Cottonwood River at Cottonwood Falls affecting Chase County. Cottonwood River near Plymouth affecting Lyon and Chase Counties. For the Cottonwood River...including Florence, Cottonwood Falls, Plymouth...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cottonwood River near Plymouth. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs along both banks. Road A near the gage site becomes flooded especially south of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 31.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 32.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 32.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Cottonwood River Plymouth 32.0 31.9 Mon 8 am CDT 31.4 27.6 20.4 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
